application

类 ImagePdfExporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.ImagePdfExporter

  • public class ImagePdfExporter
extends java.lang.Object
    The class is used to generate the proper formatted report as PDF version
    作者:
    AgriSoft

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ImagePdfExporter(java.lang.String filename, TaggableImage img, java.lang.String description)
      Setup the document to be exported, add some default content or metadata

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addDocumentHeader()
      Add a header to the Document
      void addImageDescription(java.lang.String description)
      Add a specific description to the image
      void addMetaData()
      Write the author and Creator
      void addReportImage(TaggableImage img)
      Add the image into the report with proper format
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Generates a PDF with static data To be used for testing and layout changes

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ImagePdfExporter

        public ImagePdfExporter(java.lang.String filename,
                TaggableImage img,
                java.lang.String description)
        Setup the document to be exported, add some default content or metadata
        参数:
        filename - - the PDF document name
        img - - the image need to be put into the document
        description - - the description need for the image

    • 方法详细资料

      • addMetaData

        public void addMetaData()
        Write the author and Creator

      • addDocumentHeader

        public void addDocumentHeader()
                       throws com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException
        Add a header to the Document
        抛出:
        com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException

      • addReportImage

        public void addReportImage(TaggableImage img)
                    throws com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException
        Add the image into the report with proper format
        参数:
        img - - the TaggableImage need for the report
        抛出:
        com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException

      • addImageDescription

        public void addImageDescription(java.lang.String description)
                         throws com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException
        Add a specific description to the image
        参数:
        description - - String
        抛出:
        com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Generates a PDF with static data To be used for testing and layout changes
